quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn …and change.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.text: There is no passion to be found playing small – in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth
